title: Everything to Know About Flame Fruit in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Cost.
steps.content: Cost. Flame is an uncommon elemental-type Fruit that you can buy from the Blox Fruit Dealer for $250,000 beli or 550 Robux.

steps.title: Usage.
steps.content: Usage. It has a big range, good damage, and can break Instinct, so Flame Fruit is a good choice for PvP. It's also a good choice for grinding the First Sea and in the beginning of the Second Sea. Since the Flame Fruit has a relatively low price, it is a good mid-tier Fruit.

steps.title: Fire Bullets/Z.
steps.content: Fire Bullets/ Z . 1 mastery. Shoot several flaming arrows that hit multiple targets in the direction of your cursor.

steps.title: Fire Flight/F.
steps.content: Fire Flight/ F . 10 mastery. Your legs turn into flames and you can fly.

steps.title: Burning Blast/X.
steps.content: Burning Blast/ X . 25 mastery. Fire a fist-shaped projectile toward the cursor.

steps.title: Fire Column/C.
steps.content: Fire Column/ C . 50 mastery. Slam the ground and release a surge of fire around you. Anyone caught in the surge is flown upwards and takes AoE damage.

steps.title: Flame Destroyer/V.
steps.content: Flame Destroyer/ V . 100 mastery. Create a large orb of fire and throw it that explodes when it hits a surface or reaches its maximum range, dealing a high amount of damage to anyone nearby. Charge this skill to make it more powerful.

steps.title: Blue Fire Bullets/Z.
steps.content: Blue Fire Bullets/ Z . 1 mastery; 500 fragments. Shoot forward 7 lasers, which crawl toward your cursor. When they make contact with an enemy, they are stunned. As long as all 7 lasers find a target, this skill deals damage. It costs 14,500 fragments to fully Awaken this Fruit. You can farm for fragments by raiding or defeating Indra and Blackbeard. You'll earn "The Flame Fist" title when you Awaken at least 1 move of this fruit. Check out our article on leveling Fruits to quickly get higher mastery in Flame Fruit.

steps.title: Rocket Flight/F.
steps.content: Rocket Flight/ F . 10 mastery; 2,000 fragments. Fly at a medium pace, leaving a trail of fire. Your flight will be slower if your health is low.

steps.title: Prominence Burst/X.
steps.content: Prominence Burst/ X . 25 mastery; 3,000 fragments. Fire a large and long-range pillar of fire that explodes when it makes contact with surfaces, dealing damage and knocking back enemies. This skill also leaves behind a flaming trail for 5 seconds that does ticking damage to anyone in the area.

steps.title: Flaming Vortex/C.
steps.content: Flaming Vortex/ C . 50 mastery; 4,000 fragments. Flames launch the player and nearby enemies into the air, dealing damage to enemies. This skill also has ticking damage for 5 seconds after the skill is performed.

steps.title: Hell's Core/V.
steps.content: Hell's Core/ V . 100 mastery; 5,000 fragments. Create and throw a massive ball of fire that explodes when it touches a surface or reaches its maximum range, dealing a huge amount of damage to anyone nearby. This skill also leaves behind a fire effect that has ticking damage for 5 seconds. Charge this skill to make the orb bigger and deal more damage. [1] X Research source
